text: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

translation.en: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware
translation.id: agar engkau memberi peringatan kepada suatu kaum yang nenek moyangnya belum pernah diberi peringatan, karena itu mereka lalai
